General.Name: Incap Oyj
General.Description: Incap Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronics manufacturing services in Europe, North America, and Asia. The company produces inverters, UPS devices and printed circuit board (PCBs) for fuel dispensers and sustainable energy products. It also offers PCB assembly, mass production, final assembly, design, and production of prototypes, as well as design for manufacturing feedback, testing, magnetic assemblies, and cable harnesses. In addition, the company manufactures electronics and box-build products, as well as specializes in volume production, prototypes, and pre-series products. The company serves industrial customers such as automation, power generation, and telecommunications industries. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
